amendment.description: Amendment sought to provide that a country need not meet all 12 of the eligibility requirements in order to participate or receive benefits under the Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 2 in part II of House Rpt. 105-431 to clarify that the eligibility requirements contained in the bill do not require a country to be in full compliance with every requirement in order to become eligible to participate in new trade and investment policy with the United States.

action.text: On agreeing to the Waters amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 81 - 334 (Roll No. 44).
